Class FTabPane2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent

        • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FTabPane2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FTabPane3

    public class FTabPane2
extends FContainer
    This class realizes the server side of the tab pane with extended features.
    Author:
    as, tobias (minor changes)
